Hi Elias,

Thanks so much for sending through the copy for the Comet Waste Management website.

We'd love to get those additional pages included, we agree that they're great additions. Our current quote includes the below pages:


  • Home

  • Services Overview

  • Industries

  • About Us (generic brand-focused content)

  • Contact



In light of this, there's two paths moving forward to include the additional pages of Sustainability, Waste Audit, and FAQs.

Option 1: We can add these pages to the original scope for 12hrs at our standard hourly rate of $147 ex. GST.

Option 2: We can launch the site with the five pages as agreed, and then progressively develop the remaining pages each month under your care plan.

Let me know your thoughts here, and in the meantime, we'll move forward with the content for the pages included in the scope.

Thanks very much,


Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Elias,

Thanks for sending these through.

I’ve looped in Ava, our Project Manager, the best person for this to review the structure and navigation flow. She'll get back to you after reviewing.

Let me know if there's anything else we can do for you, always happy to help

From: Rachel Smith <rachel@rachelsmith.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 27 November 2025 9:22 PM
To: Elias Abi-Merhi <elias@horizoncleaning.com.au>
Subject: COMET | Copydeck + mockups #V1


Hey Elias,


Hope you've had a great day. I had high hopes of getting this to you by COB but it's a beast so it took a bit longer than I anticipated!


So, this is version #1 of the copy, in a text format / Word doc (attached) and as mock-ups (links below).

The Word doc has notes for you, and for the design team, so it's worth having a read of it for additional context. The mock-ups are just a way to view the copy how I think it would be best displayed on a website (but the designer may have better ideas! It's just a starting point).



Mockups:

→ Home: https://owmmo.draftium.site/
→ About: https://owmmo.draftium.site/about
→ Industries: https://owmmo.draftium.site/industries
→ Services / Commercial waste management: https://owmmo.draftium.site/services

→ Sustainability: https://owmmo.draftium.site/sustainability

→ Book a waste audit: https://owmmo.draftium.site/book-a-waste-audit

→ FAQ: https://owmmo.draftium.site/faq
→ Contact: https://owmmo.draftium.site/contact

The copy
 As you know, there's been an enormous amount of info to gather, go through and collate so I may have missed a thing or two 😊 We can go through it together if that's easier, before it goes to the design team, if there are things you'd like to add or tweak. Or, if you want to just send the Word doc to the design team to get started, that's fine too. The doc also has links to the mock-ups so they'll be able to get my notes and check the mock-ups out when they start the design.

Lastly…
 Some of the copy may seem a little repetitive in parts, but just remember, customers will be hitting different pages of the site due to searches; they won't necessarily be going to the home page and navigating through it in a linear way. So each page has to encapsulate a bit of what Comet does and give potential customers the key info they need.

Love to hear your feedback when you get a chance to go through everything.

Thank you!
Rach
